welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Bobenheim-Roxheim! This quaint town is known for its picturesque scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy the unique charm of our city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mannheim Airport, mostly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Heidelberg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights within Germany.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
